00141 Result LoadMeshFromX(String filename, MeshData *mdata)
00142 {
00143         byte fileformat, floatbits;
00144         DWORD plaindata_arraysize;
00145         PlainDataPtr tokendata;
00146         WORD token;
00147         char* buf;
00148         Result rlt;
00149 
00150         CHKALLOC(buf = new char[8]);
00151 
00152         std::ifstream fs(filename, std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00153 
00154         fs.read(buf, sizeof(long));
00155         if(*(long*)buf != XOFFILE_FORMAT_MAGIC)
00156                 return ERR(String("Invalid file: ") << String(filename));
00157 
00158         fs.read(buf, sizeof(long));
00159         if(*(long*)buf != XOFFILE_FORMAT_VERSION)
00160                 return ERR(String("Unsupported file version: ") << String(filename));
00161 
00162         fs.read(buf, sizeof(long));
00163         switch(*(long*)buf)
00164         {
00165         case XOFFILE_FORMAT_BINARY:
00166                 fileformat = D3DXF_FILEFORMAT_BINARY;
00167                 break;
00168 
00169         case XOFFILE_FORMAT_TEXT:
00170                 fileformat = D3DXF_FILEFORMAT_TEXT;
00171                 break;
00172 
00173         case XOFFILE_FORMAT_COMPRESSED:
00174                 fileformat = D3DXF_FILEFORMAT_COMPRESSED;
00175                 return ERR(String("Compressed file not supported: ") << String(filename));
00176 
00177         default:
00178                 return ERR(String("Invalid file: ") << String(filename));
00179         }
00180 
00181         fs.read(buf, sizeof(long));
00182         switch(*(long*)buf)
00183         {
00184         case XOFFILE_FORMAT_FLOAT_BITS_32:
00185                 floatbits = 32;
00186                 break;
00187 
00188         case XOFFILE_FORMAT_FLOAT_BITS_64:
00189                 floatbits = 64;
00190                 break;
00191 
00192         default:
00193                 return ERR(String("Unsupported float size: ") << String(filename));
00194         }
00195 
00196 std::list<Template*> templates;
00197 /*std::list<DataObject*> dataobjects;*/
00198 Template* newtpl;
00199 /*DataObject* newobj;*/
00200         while(1)
00201         {
00202                 CHKRESULT(ParseToken(&fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &tokendata, &plaindata_arraysize));
00203                 switch(token)
00204                 {
00205                 case TOKEN_TEMPLATE:
00206                         // Template definition
00207                         CHKALLOC(newtpl = new Template());
00208                         IFFAILED(ParseTemplate(&fs, fileformat, floatbits, &templates, newtpl))
00209                         {
00210                                 newtpl->vars.clear();
00211                                 REMOVE(newtpl);
00212                                 return rlt;
00213                         }
00214                         templates.push_back(newtpl);
00215                         break;
00216 
00217                 case TOKEN_NAME: case TOKEN_PLAINTEXT:
00218                         // Template name as type in text files (ASCII string) or binary files (TOKEN_NAME record)
00219 CHKRESULT(TestwiseLoadMesh(&fs, fileformat, floatbits, *tokendata.s, &templates, mdata));
00220 templates.clear();
00221 fs.close();
00222 return R_OK;
00223                         /*CHKRESULT(ParseDataObject(&fs, fileformat, floatbits, *tokendata.s, &templates, &newobj));
00224                         dataobjects.push_back(newobj);*/
00225                         break;
00226 
00227                 case TOKEN_WORD: case TOKEN_DWORD: case TOKEN_FLOAT: case TOKEN_DOUBLE: case TOKEN_CHAR:
00228                 case TOKEN_UCHAR: case TOKEN_SWORD: case TOKEN_SDWORD: case TOKEN_LPSTR:
00229                         // Valid primitive type
00230                         return ERR("Top level primitive types not supported");
00231 
00232                 case TOKEN_CSTRING:
00233                         // Unsupported type
00234                         return ERR("Unsupported type: CString");
00235                 case TOKEN_UNICODE:
00236                         // Unsupported type
00237                         return ERR("Unsupported type: Unicode");
00238 
00239                 default:
00240                         return ERR(String("Unexpected token: ") << String(token));
00241                 }
00242         }
00243 templates.clear();
00244 /*dataobjects.clear();*/
00245 
00246         fs.close();
00247 
00248         return R_OK;
00249 }

00251 Result ParseTokenString(std::ifstream* fs, byte floatbits, WORD* token, PlainDataPtr* tokendata)
00252 {
00253         bool iscomment = false;
00254         String strtoken;
00255         int oanglepos;
00256         char chr;
00257 
00258         strtoken = String();
00259         *token = NULL;
00260 
00261         // Find first character of token string
00262         while(1)
00263         {
00264                 ReadVar(&chr, 1);
00265 
00266                 if(iscomment)
00267                 {
00268                         if(chr == '\n')
00269                                 iscomment = false;
00270 
00271                         continue;
00272                 }
00273 
00274                 switch(chr)
00275                 {
00276                 case '{':
00277                         *token = TOKEN_OBRACE;
00278                         return R_OK;
00279 
00280                 case '}':
00281                         *token = TOKEN_CBRACE;
00282                         return R_OK;
00283 
00284                 case '(':
00285                         *token = TOKEN_OPAREN;
00286                         return R_OK;
00287 
00288                 case ')':
00289                         *token = TOKEN_CPAREN;
00290                         return R_OK;
00291 
00292                 case '[':
00293                         *token = TOKEN_OBRACKET;
00294                         return R_OK;
00295 
00296                 case ']':
00297                         *token = TOKEN_CBRACKET;
00298                         return R_OK;
00299 
00300                 case '<':
00301                         {
00302                                 // This brace might open a UUID
00303                                 char nextchr = fs->peek();
00304                                 if((nextchr >= '0' && nextchr <= '9') || (nextchr >= 'a' && nextchr <= 'f') || (nextchr >= 'A' && nextchr <= 'F'))
00305                                 {
00306                                         ReadVar(&chr, 1); // Skip '<'
00307                                         oanglepos = fs->tellg(); // Save file position after next char to '<'
00308                                         *token = TOKEN_PLAINUUID;
00309                                         break;
00310                                 }
00311                         }
00312                         *token = TOKEN_OANGLE;
00313                         return R_OK;
00314 
00315                 case '>':
00316                         *token = TOKEN_CANGLE;
00317                         return R_OK;
00318 
00319                 case '.':
00320                         *token = TOKEN_DOT;
00321                         return R_OK;
00322 
00323                 case ',':
00324                         *token = TOKEN_COMMA;
00325                         return R_OK;
00326 
00327                 case ';':
00328                         *token = TOKEN_SEMICOLON;
00329                         return R_OK;
00330 
00331                 case '/':
00332                         if(fs->peek() != '/')
00333                                 break;
00334                 case '#':
00335                         iscomment = true;
00336                 }
00337 
00338                 if((chr >= 'a' && chr <= 'z') || (chr >= 'A' && chr <= 'Z') || (chr >= '0' && chr <= '9') || chr == '_' || chr == '-')
00339                         break;
00340         }
00341 
00342         if(*token != TOKEN_PLAINUUID)
00343                 *token = (chr >= '0' && chr <= '9') || chr == '-' ? TOKEN_PLAININTEGER : TOKEN_PLAINTEXT;
00344 
00345         // Read string
00346         strtoken = String();
00347         while(1)
00348         {
00349                 strtoken <<= (TCHAR)chr;
00350 
00351                 ReadVar(&chr, 1);
00352 
00353                 if(*token == TOKEN_PLAININTEGER && chr == '.')
00354                 {
00355                         char nextchr = fs->peek();
00356                         if(nextchr == '.') // '123..' -> error
00357                                 return ERR(String("Syntax error parsing number: \"") << strtoken << String("..\""));
00358 
00359                         // This variable is no longer a whole number
00360                         *token = TOKEN_PLAINDECIMAL;
00361                         continue;
00362                 }
00363 
00364                 // 'a' - 'f', 'A' - 'F' are invalid for numeric contend
00365                 if((chr >= 'a' && chr <= 'f') || (chr >= 'A' && chr <= 'F'))
00366                 {
00367                         if(*token == TOKEN_PLAININTEGER || *token == TOKEN_PLAINDECIMAL)
00368                                 return ERR(String("Syntax error parsing number: \"") << strtoken << String((TCHAR)chr) << String('\"'));
00369                 }
00370                 // 'g' - 'z', 'G' - 'Z' and '_' are invalid for numeric contend and UUIDs
00371                 else if((chr >= 'g' && chr <= 'z') || (chr >= 'G' && chr <= 'Z') || chr == '_')
00372                 {
00373                         if(*token == TOKEN_PLAININTEGER || *token == TOKEN_PLAINDECIMAL)
00374                                 return ERR(String("Syntax error parsing number: \"") << strtoken << String((TCHAR)chr) << String('\"'));
00375                         else if(*token == TOKEN_PLAINUUID)
00376                                 return ERR(String("Syntax error parsing UUID: \"") << strtoken << String((TCHAR)chr) << String('\"'));
00377                 }
00378                 // '-' is invalid for numeric contend and plain text
00379                 else if(chr == '-')
00380                 {
00381                         if(*token == TOKEN_PLAININTEGER || *token == TOKEN_PLAINDECIMAL)
00382                                 return ERR(String("Syntax error parsing number: \"") << strtoken << String((TCHAR)chr) << String('\"'));
00383                         else if(*token == TOKEN_PLAINTEXT)
00384                                 return ERR(String("Syntax error parsing string: \"") << strtoken << String((TCHAR)chr) << String('\"'));
00385                 }
00386                 // '0' - '9' is valid for all plain data
00387                 else if(chr < '0' || chr > '9')
00388                         break;
00389         }
00390 
00391         switch(*token)
00392         {
00393         case TOKEN_PLAINTEXT:
00394                 // Parse string
00395                 if(strtoken == String("template"))
00396                         *token = TOKEN_TEMPLATE;
00397                 else if(strtoken == String("WORD"))
00398                         *token = TOKEN_WORD;
00399                 else if(strtoken == String("DWORD"))
00400                         *token = TOKEN_DWORD;
00401                 else if(strtoken == String("FLOAT"))
00402                         *token = TOKEN_FLOAT;
00403                 else if(strtoken == String("DOUBLE"))
00404                         *token = TOKEN_DOUBLE;
00405                 else if(strtoken == String("CHAR"))
00406                         *token = TOKEN_CHAR;
00407                 else if(strtoken == String("FLOAT"))
00408                         *token = TOKEN_FLOAT;
00409                 else if(strtoken == String("UCHAR"))
00410                         *token = TOKEN_UCHAR;
00411                 else if(strtoken == String("SWORD"))
00412                         *token = TOKEN_SWORD;
00413                 else if(strtoken == String("VOID"))
00414                         *token = TOKEN_VOID;
00415                 else if(strtoken == String("STRING"))
00416                         *token = TOKEN_LPSTR;
00417                 //else if(strtoken == String("UNICODE")) // Unsupported
00418                 //      *token = TOKEN_UNICODE; // Unsupported
00419                 //else if(strtoken == String("CSTRING")) // Unsupported
00420                 //      *token = TOKEN_CSTRING; // Unsupported
00421                 else if(strtoken == String("array"))
00422                         *token = TOKEN_ARRAY;
00423 
00424                 CHKALLOC(tokendata->s = new String(strtoken));
00425                 break;
00426 
00427         case TOKEN_PLAININTEGER:
00428                 // Parse integer
00429                 CHKALLOC(tokendata->i = new DWORD(strtoken.ToInt()));
00430                 break;
00431 
00432         case TOKEN_PLAINDECIMAL:
00433                 // Parse decimal
00434                 if(floatbits == 32)
00435                 {
00436                         CHKALLOC(tokendata->f = new float(strtoken.ToFloat()));
00437                 }
00438                 else // floatbits == 64
00439                 {
00440                         CHKALLOC(tokendata->d = new double(strtoken.ToDouble()));
00441                 }
00442                 break;
00443 
00444         case TOKEN_PLAINUUID:
00445                 // Parse UUID
00446                 UUID uuidtoken;
00447 #ifdef UNICODE
00448 typedef RPC_WSTR RPC_STR;
00449 #else
00450 typedef RPC_CSTR RPC_STR;
00451 #endif
00452                 if(!UuidFromString((RPC_STR)(LPTSTR)strtoken, &uuidtoken) == RPC_S_OK)
00453                 {
00454                         // Invalid UUID -> return '<' token
00455                         fs->seekg(oanglepos); // Restore file position after next char to '<'
00456                         *token = TOKEN_OANGLE;
00457                 }
00458                 else
00459                         CHKALLOC(tokendata->u = new UUID(uuidtoken));
00460                 break;
00461         }
00462 
00463         // Shift readpos to end of token
00464         if(*token != TOKEN_PLAINUUID) // Skip '>' after UUID
00465                 fs->seekg((int)fs->tellg() - 1);
00466 
00467         return R_OK;
00468 }
00469 
00470 Result ParseToken(std::ifstream* fs, byte fileformat, byte floatbits, WORD* token, PlainDataPtr* tokendata, DWORD* arraysize)
00471 {
00472         Result rlt;
00473 
00474         // Default to single data objects
00475         *arraysize = 1;
00476 
00477         switch(fileformat)
00478         {
00479         case D3DXF_FILEFORMAT_BINARY:
00480                 ReadVar(token, sizeof(WORD));
00481                 switch(*token)
00482                 {
00483                 case TOKEN_NAME:
00484                         // Read TOKEN_NAME record
00485                         {
00486                                 char* namechars;
00487                                 DWORD strlen;
00488 
00489                                 ReadVar(&strlen, sizeof(DWORD));
00490                                 CHKALLOC(namechars = new char[strlen + 1]);
00491                                 ReadVar(namechars, strlen);
00492                                 namechars[strlen] = NULL;
00493                                 CHKALLOC((*tokendata).s = new String(namechars)); //EDIT: Will cause an error when build for WCHAR systems
00494                         }
00495                         break;
00496 
00497                 case TOKEN_INTEGER:
00498                         // Read TOKEN_INTEGER record
00499                         CHKALLOC((*tokendata).i = new DWORD());
00500                         ReadVar((*tokendata).i, sizeof(DWORD))
00501                         break;
00502 
00503                 case TOKEN_GUID:
00504                         // Read TOKEN_GUID record
00505                         CHKALLOC((*tokendata).u = new GUID());
00506                         ReadVar((*tokendata).u, sizeof(UUID))
00507                         break;
00508 
00509                 case TOKEN_INTEGER_LIST:
00510                         // Read TOKEN_INTEGER_LIST record
00511                         ReadVar(arraysize, sizeof(DWORD));
00512                         CHKALLOC((*tokendata).i = new DWORD[*arraysize]);
00513                         ReadVar((*tokendata).i, *arraysize * sizeof(DWORD));
00514                         break;
00515 
00516                 case TOKEN_FLOAT_LIST:
00517                         // Read TOKEN_INTEGER_LIST record
00518                         ReadVar(arraysize, sizeof(DWORD));
00519                         if(floatbits == 32)
00520                         {
00521                                 CHKALLOC((*tokendata).f = new float[*arraysize]);
00522                                 ReadVar((*tokendata).f, *arraysize * sizeof(float));
00523                         }
00524                         else // floatbits == 64
00525                         {
00526                                 CHKALLOC((*tokendata).d = new double[*arraysize]);
00527                                 ReadVar((*tokendata).d, *arraysize * sizeof(double));
00528                         }
00529                         break;
00530 
00531                 default:
00532                         (*tokendata).s = NULL;
00533                 }
00534                 return R_OK;
00535 
00536         case D3DXF_FILEFORMAT_TEXT:
00537                 CHKRESULT(ParseTokenString(fs, floatbits, token, tokendata));
00538                 return R_OK;
00539 
00540         default:
00541                 return ERR("Invalid file format");
00542         }
00543 }
00544 
00545 Result ParseTemplate(std::ifstream* fs, byte fileformat, byte floatbits, const std::list<Template*>* prevtpls, Template* tpl)
00546 {
00547         std::list<Template*>::const_iterator template_itr;
00548         std::list<VarDecl*>::const_iterator vardecl_itr;
00549         DWORD plaindata_arraysize;
00550         PlainDataPtr plaindata;
00551         OptVarDecl newoptvar;
00552         VarDecl newvar;
00553         WORD token;
00554         DWORD i;
00555         Result rlt;
00556 
00557         // Initialize template
00558         tpl->restrictions = Template::RT_CLOSED;
00559 
00560         // Parse template name
00561         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
00562         switch(token)
00563         {
00564         case TOKEN_NAME: case TOKEN_PLAINTEXT:
00565                 // Template name in text files (ASCII string) or binary files (TOKEN_NAME record)
00566                 tpl->name = *plaindata.s;
00567                 break;
00568 
00569         case TOKEN_OBRACE:
00570                 // Template has no name
00571                 return ERR(String("Template definition missing name"));
00572 
00573         default:
00574                 return ERR(String("Unexpected token in template definition: ") << String(token));
00575         }
00576 
00577         // Read TOKEN_OBRACE
00578         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
00579         if(token != TOKEN_OBRACE)
00580                 return ERR(String("Unexpected token in template definition: ") << String(token));
00581 
00582         // Parse TOKEN_GUID record
00583         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
00584         switch(token)
00585         {
00586         case TOKEN_GUID: case TOKEN_PLAINUUID:
00587                 // Template UUID in text files (ASCII string) or binary files (TOKEN_GUID record)
00588                 tpl->uuid = *plaindata.u;
00589                 break;
00590 
00591         default:
00592                 return ERR(String("Unexpected token in template definition: ") << String(token));
00593         }
00594 
00595         // Parse template member list
00596         while(1)
00597         {
00598                 // Initialize newvar
00599                 newvar.isarray = false;
00600                 newvar.arraydims.resize(0); // Clear arraydims without freeing its content
00601 
00602 ParseVarType:
00603                 // Parse variable type
00604                 CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
00605                 switch(token)
00606                 {
00607                 case TOKEN_WORD: case TOKEN_DWORD: case TOKEN_FLOAT: case TOKEN_DOUBLE: case TOKEN_CHAR:
00608                 case TOKEN_UCHAR: case TOKEN_SWORD: case TOKEN_SDWORD: case TOKEN_LPSTR:
00609                         // Valid primitive type
00610                         newvar.type.token = token;
00611                         newvar.type_usage = TU_TOKEN;
00612                         break;
00613 
00614                 case TOKEN_CSTRING:
00615                         // Unsupported type
00616                         return ERR("Unsupported type: CString");
00617                 case TOKEN_UNICODE:
00618                         // Unsupported type
00619                         return ERR("Unsupported type: Unicode");
00620 
00621                 case TOKEN_ARRAY:
00622                         // Array prefix
00623                         newvar.isarray = true;
00624                         goto ParseVarType;
00625 
00626                 case TOKEN_VOID:
00627                         return ERR("Illegal use of type void for template member definition");
00628 
00629                 case TOKEN_NAME: case TOKEN_PLAINTEXT:
00630                         // Template name as type in text files (ASCII string) or binary files (TOKEN_NAME record)
00631                         LPLIST_FOREACH(prevtpls, template_itr)
00632                                 if(*plaindata.s == (*template_itr)->name)
00633                                 {
00634                                         newvar.type.tpl = *template_itr;
00635                                         newvar.type_usage = TU_TEMPLATE;
00636                                         break;
00637                                 }
00638                         if(template_itr == prevtpls->end())
00639                                 return ERR(String("Type template undefined: \'") << *plaindata.s <<
00640                                                    String("\'\nReferenced in template \'") << tpl->name << String('\''));
00641                         break;
00642 
00643                 case TOKEN_CBRACE:
00644                         // Template member list finished
00645                         if(tpl->vars.empty())
00646                                 return ERR(String("Template definition without members: template ") << tpl->name);
00647                         break;
00648 
00649                 case TOKEN_OBRACKET:
00650                         // Template is open or restricted
00651                         {
00652                                 tpl->restrictions = Template::RT_RESTRICTED;
00653 
00654                                 // Parse template optional member list
00655                                 while(1)
00656                                 {
00657                                         // Initialize newoptvar
00658                                         newoptvar.uuid = GUID_NULL;
00659 
00660                                         // Parse optional variable type
00661                                         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
00662                                         switch(token)
00663                                         {
00664                                         case TOKEN_NAME: case TOKEN_PLAINTEXT:
00665                                                 // Template name as type in text files (ASCII string) or binary files (TOKEN_NAME record)
00666                                                 LPLIST_FOREACH(prevtpls, template_itr)
00667                                                         if(*plaindata.s == (*template_itr)->name)
00668                                                         {
00669                                                                 newoptvar.type.tpl = *template_itr;
00670                                                                 newoptvar.type_usage = TU_TEMPLATE;
00671                                                                 break;
00672                                                         }
00673                                                 if(template_itr == prevtpls->end())
00674                                                         return ERR(String("Type template undefined: \'") << *plaindata.s <<
00675                                                                            String("\'\nReferenced in template \'") << tpl->name << String('\''));
00676                                                 break;
00677 
00678                                         case TOKEN_CBRACKET:
00679                                                 // Template optional member list finished
00680                                                 if(tpl->optvars.empty())
00681                                                         return ERR(String("Template definition with empty optional member list: template ") << tpl->name);
00682                                                 break;
00683 
00684                                         case TOKEN_DOT:
00685                                                 // Template is open
00686                                                 tpl->restrictions = Template::RT_OPEN;
00687 
00688                                                 if(!tpl->optvars.empty()) // A '.' is an ivalid token in restricted template definitions
00689                                                         return ERR(String("Unexpected token in template definition: ") << String(token));
00690 
00691                                                 // Parse 2 * TOKEN_DOT & TOKEN_CBRACKET to finish the syntax definition for open templates ('[...]')
00692                                                 CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
00693                                                 if(token != TOKEN_DOT)
00694                                                         return ERR(String("Unexpected token in template definition: ") << String(token));
00695                                                 CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
00696                                                 if(token != TOKEN_DOT)
00697                                                         return ERR(String("Unexpected token in template definition: ") << String(token));
00698                                                 CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
00699                                                 if(token != TOKEN_CBRACKET)
00700                                                         return ERR(String("Unexpected token in template definition: ") << String(token));
00701                                                 break;
00702 
00703                                         default:
00704                                                 return ERR(String("Unexpected token in template definition: ") << String(token));
00705                                         }
00706 
00707                                         if(token == TOKEN_CBRACKET)
00708                                         {
00709                                                 // Template optional member list finished
00710 
00711                                                 // Read TOKEN_CBRACE
00712                                                 CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
00713                                                 if(token != TOKEN_CBRACE)
00714                                                         return ERR(String("Unexpected token in template definition: ") << String(token));
00715                                                 break;
00716                                         }
00717 
00718                                         // Parse TOKEN_GUID record, if present
00719                                         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
00720                                         switch(token)
00721                                         {
00722                                         case TOKEN_GUID: case TOKEN_PLAINUUID:
00723                                                 // Template UUID in text files (ASCII string) or binary files (TOKEN_GUID record)
00724                                                 newoptvar.uuid = *plaindata.u;
00725                                                 break;
00726 
00727                                         case TOKEN_COMMA: case TOKEN_CBRACKET:
00728                                                 // No UUID present
00729                                                 break;
00730 
00731                                         default:
00732                                                 return ERR(String("Unexpected token in template definition: ") << String(token));
00733                                         }
00734 
00735                                         if(token == TOKEN_CBRACKET)
00736                                         {
00737                                                 // Template optional member list finished
00738 
00739                                                 // Read TOKEN_CBRACE
00740                                                 CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
00741                                                 if(token != TOKEN_CBRACE)
00742                                                         return ERR(String("Unexpected token in template definition: ") << String(token));
00743                                                 break;
00744                                         }
00745 
00746                                         // Finalize newoptvar
00747                                         tpl->optvars.push_back(new OptVarDecl(newoptvar));
00748                                 }
00749                         }
00750                         break;
00751 
00752                 default:
00753                         return ERR(String("Unexpected token in template definition: ") << String(token));
00754                 }
00755                 if(token == TOKEN_CBRACE)
00756                         break;
00757 
00758                 // Parse variable name
00759                 CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
00760                 switch(token)
00761                 {
00762                 case TOKEN_NAME: case TOKEN_PLAINTEXT:
00763                         // Variable name in text files (ASCII string) or binary files (TOKEN_NAME record)
00764                         newvar.name = *plaindata.s;
00765                         break;
00766 
00767                 case TOKEN_SEMICOLON:
00768                         // Variable has no name
00769                         if(newvar.isarray)
00770                                 return ERR(String("Array member definition missing name"));
00771                         break;
00772 
00773                 default:
00774                         return ERR(String("Unexpected token in template member definition: ") << String(token));
00775                 }
00776 
00777                 if(newvar.isarray)
00778                 {
00779                         // Parse array dimension-sizes
00780                         while(1)
00781                         {
00782                                 // Read TOKEN_OBRACKET or TOKEN_SEMICOLON
00783                                 CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
00784                                 if(token == TOKEN_SEMICOLON)
00785                                 {
00786                                         // No more array dimensions
00787                                         if(newvar.arraydims.empty())
00788                                                 return ERR(String("Array definition without dimensions: template member \'") << newvar.name << String('\''));
00789                                         break;
00790                                 }
00791                                 else if(token != TOKEN_OBRACKET)
00792                                         return ERR(String("Unexpected token in template member definition: ") << String(token));
00793 
00794                                 // Parse array dimension-size
00795                                 CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
00796                                 switch(token)
00797                                 {
00798                                 case TOKEN_NAME: case TOKEN_PLAINTEXT:
00799                                         // Variable name as array dimension-size in text files (ASCII string) or binary files (TOKEN_NAME record)
00800                                         LIST_FOREACH_I(tpl->vars, vardecl_itr, i)
00801                                                 if(*plaindata.s == (*vardecl_itr)->name)
00802                                                 {
00803                                                         newvar.arraydims.push_back(new ArrayDimension(ASU_INDEX, i));
00804                                                         break;
00805                                                 }
00806                                         if(vardecl_itr == tpl->vars.end())
00807                                                 return ERR(String("Array dimension variable undefined: \'") << *plaindata.s <<
00808                                                                    String("\'\nReferenced in template \'") << tpl->name << String('\''));
00809                                         break;
00810 
00811                                 case TOKEN_INTEGER: case TOKEN_PLAININTEGER:
00812                                         // Fixed dimension-size in text files (ASCII string) or binary files (TOKEN_INTEGER record)
00813                                         newvar.arraydims.push_back(new ArrayDimension(ASU_CONSTANT, *plaindata.i));
00814                                         break;
00815 
00816                                 case TOKEN_CBRACKET:
00817                                         // Variable has no dimension-size
00818                                         return ERR(String("Arrays of undefined dimension aren't supported"));
00819 
00820                                 default:
00821                                         return ERR(String("Unexpected token in template member definition: ") << String(token));
00822                                 }
00823 
00824                                 // Read TOKEN_CBRACKET
00825                                 CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
00826                                 if(token != TOKEN_CBRACKET)
00827                                         return ERR(String("Unexpected token in template member definition: ") << String(token));
00828                         }
00829                 }
00830                 else
00831                 {
00832                         // Read TOKEN_SEMICOLON
00833                         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
00834                         if(token == TOKEN_OBRACKET)
00835                                 return ERR(String("Array definitions must be preceded by 'array': template member \'") << newvar.name << String('\''));
00836                         else if(token != TOKEN_SEMICOLON)
00837                                 return ERR(String("Unexpected token in template definition: ") << String(token));
00838                 }
00839 
00840                 // Finalize newvar
00841                 tpl->vars.push_back(new VarDecl(newvar));
00842 //EDIT: arraydims will not be removed in the destructor of newvar.
00843 //              Doing so would destroy the contents of a newly pushed back variable by destroying the local variable newvar.
00844 //              This could be solved using a smart pointer on VarDecl while adding 'arraydims'-removage in its destructor.
00845         }
00846 
00847         return R_OK;
00848 }
00849 
00850 //Result GetDataOffset(const DataObject* obj, const String* varname, DWORD* offset, bool* done)
00851 //{
00852 //      std::list<FixedVarDecl*>::const_iterator fixedvardecl_itr;
00853 //
00854 //      LIST_FOREACH(tpl->vars, fixedvardecl_itr)
00855 //      {
00856 //              if((*fixedvardecl_itr)->name == varname)
00857 //              {
00858 //                      *done = true;
00859 //                      return R_OK;
00860 //              }
00861 //              FixedVarDecl::
00862 //              (*fixedvardecl_itr)
00863 //      }
00864 //
00865 //      return R_OK;

00867 
00868 /*Result ParseDataMembers(std::ifstream* fs, byte fileformat, byte floatbits, const std::list<Template*>* tpls,
00869                                                 const Template* tpl, DWORD arraysize, DWORD* dataoffset, DataObject* obj)
00870 {
00871         std::list<FixedVarDecl*>::const_iterator fixedvardecl_itr;
00872         std::list<ArrayDimension*>::const_iterator arrdim_itr;
00873         std::list<Template*>::const_iterator template_itr;
00874         std::list<VarDecl*>::const_iterator vardecl_itr;
00875         std::list<Data*>::const_iterator data_itr;
00876         FixedVarDecl newfixedvardecl, *newfixedvardeclptr;
00877         DWORD totalarraysize, plaindata_arraysize;
00878         std::list<FixedVarDecl*> tplfixedvars;
00879         PlainDataPtr plaindata;
00880         DWORD i, dataoffset_, arraysize_value;
00881         WORD token;
00882         Result rlt;
00883 
00884         for(DWORD j = 0; j < arraysize; j++)
00885                 // Parse data members
00886                 LIST_FOREACH(tpl->vars, vardecl_itr)
00887                 {
00888                         // Initialize newfixedvardecl
00889                         newfixedvardecl.name = (*vardecl_itr)->name;
00890                         newfixedvardecl.type_usage = (*vardecl_itr)->type_usage;
00891                         newfixedvardecl.type = (*vardecl_itr)->type;
00892                         newfixedvardecl.isarray = (*vardecl_itr)->isarray;
00893                         newfixedvardecl.offset = *dataoffset;
00894 
00895                         // Compute total array dimension-size
00896                         totalarraysize = 1;
00897                         if((*vardecl_itr)->isarray)
00898                                 LIST_FOREACH((*vardecl_itr)->arraydims, arrdim_itr)
00899                                 {
00900                                         if((*arrdim_itr)->arraysize_usage == ASU_INDEX)
00901                                         {
00902                                                 // Get variable declaration by index
00903                                                 fixedvardecl_itr = tplfixedvars.begin();
00904                                                 for(i = 0; i < (*arrdim_itr)->arraysize; i++)
00905                                                         fixedvardecl_itr++;
00906 
00907                                                 dataoffset_ = (*fixedvardecl_itr)->offset;
00908                                                 LIST_FOREACH(obj->data, data_itr)
00909                                                 {
00910                                                         if(dataoffset_ >= (*data_itr)->buflen)
00911                                                                 dataoffset_ -= (*data_itr)->buflen;
00912                                                         else
00913                                                         {
00914                                                                 arraysize_value = *(DWORD*)((BYTE*)((*data_itr)->buffer) + dataoffset_);
00915                                                                 break;
00916                                                         }
00917                                                 }
00918                                                 totalarraysize *= arraysize_value;
00919                                                 newfixedvardecl.arraydims.push_back(arraysize_value);
00920                                         }
00921                                         else // (*arrdim_itr)->arraysize_usage == ASU_CONSTANT
00922                                         {
00923                                                 totalarraysize *= (*arrdim_itr)->arraysize;
00924                                                 newfixedvardecl.arraydims.push_back((*arrdim_itr)->arraysize);
00925                                         }
00926                                 }
00927 
00928                         if(newfixedvardecl.type_usage == TU_TEMPLATE)
00929                         {
00930                                 // Parse data members
00931                                 CHKRESULT(ParseDataMembers(fs, fileformat, floatbits, tpls, (*vardecl_itr)->type.tpl, totalarraysize, dataoffset, obj));
00932                         }
00933                         else // (*vardecl_itr)->type_usage == TU_TOKEN
00934                         {
00935                                 // Get ammount of needed data
00936                                 switch((*vardecl_itr)->type.token)
00937                                 {
00938                                 case TOKEN_WORD: case TOKEN_DWORD: case TOKEN_CHAR:
00939                                 case TOKEN_UCHAR: case TOKEN_SWORD: case TOKEN_SDWORD:
00940                                         // Valid primitive type, stored in a TOKEN_INTEGER_LIST
00941                                         *dataoffset += totalarraysize * sizeof(DWORD);
00942                                         obj->appointeddatasize += totalarraysize * sizeof(DWORD);
00943                                         break;
00944 
00945                                 case TOKEN_FLOAT: case TOKEN_DOUBLE:
00946                                         // Valid primitive type, stored in a TOKEN_FLOAT_LIST
00947                                         *dataoffset += totalarraysize * sizeof(float);
00948                                         obj->appointeddatasize += totalarraysize * sizeof(float);
00949                                         break;
00950 
00951                                 case TOKEN_LPSTR:
00952                                         // Valid primitive type, stored in an array of type TOKEN_STRING
00953                                         //*dataoffset += totalarraysize * sizeof(xyz);
00954                                         //obj->appointeddatasize += totalarraysize * sizeof(xyz);
00955                                         return ERR("EDIT");
00956 
00957                                 default:
00958                                         return ERR(String("Unexpected token in template definition: ") << String(token));
00959                                 }
00960 
00961                                 // Parse needed data
00962                                 while(obj->datasize < obj->appointeddatasize)
00963                                 {
00964                                         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
00965                                         switch(token)
00966                                         {
00967                                         case TOKEN_INTEGER_LIST:
00968                                                 // Store primitive data object
00969                                                 obj->data.push_back(new Data(plaindata.i, plaindata_arraysize * sizeof(DWORD), TOKEN_INTEGER_LIST));
00970                                                 obj->datasize += plaindata_arraysize * sizeof(DWORD);
00971                                                 break;
00972 
00973                                         case TOKEN_FLOAT_LIST:
00974                                                 // Store primitive data object
00975                                                 obj->data.push_back(new Data(plaindata.f, plaindata_arraysize * sizeof(float), TOKEN_FLOAT_LIST));
00976                                                 obj->datasize += plaindata_arraysize * sizeof(float);
00977                                                 break;
00978 
00979                                         case TOKEN_STRING:
00980                                                 return ERR("EDIT");
00981 
00982                                         default:
00983                                                 return ERR(String("Unexpected token during data parsing: ") << String(token));
00984                                         }
00985                                 }
00986                         }
00987 
00988                         // Finalize newfixedvardecl
00989                         CHKALLOC(newfixedvardeclptr = new FixedVarDecl(newfixedvardecl));
00990                         tplfixedvars.push_back(newfixedvardeclptr);
00991                         if(j == 0) // Only store the new variable declaration once for every array
00992                                 obj->vars.push_back(newfixedvardeclptr);
00993                 }
00994 
00995         return R_OK;
00996 }*/
00997 
00998 /*Result ParseDataObject(std::ifstream* fs, byte fileformat, byte floatbits, String tplname, const std::list<Template*>* tpls, DataObject** obj)
00999 {
01000         std::list<Template*>::const_iterator template_itr;
01001         DWORD plaindata_arraysize;
01002         PlainDataPtr plaindata;
01003         WORD token;
01004         DWORD i;
01005         Result rlt;
01006 
01007         // Create new data object
01008         CHKALLOC(*obj = new DataObject());
01009         (*obj)->datasize = (*obj)->appointeddatasize = 0;
01010 
01011         LPLIST_FOREACH_I(tpls, template_itr, i)
01012                 if(tplname == (*template_itr)->name)
01013                 {
01014                         // Store data template
01015                         (*obj)->tpl = *template_itr;
01016                         break;
01017                 }
01018         if(template_itr == tpls->end())
01019                 return ERR(String("Data object without matching template: \'") << tplname << String('\''));
01020 
01021         // Parse data name, if present
01022         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01023         switch(token)
01024         {
01025         case TOKEN_NAME: case TOKEN_PLAINTEXT:
01026                 // Data name in text files (ASCII string) or binary files (TOKEN_NAME record)
01027                 (*obj)->name = *plaindata.s;
01028                 break;
01029 
01030         case TOKEN_OBRACE:
01031                 // Data has no name
01032                 (*obj)->name = String();
01033                 break;
01034 
01035         default:
01036                 return ERR(String("Unexpected token in data object: ") << String(token));
01037         }
01038 
01039 //EDIT: Parse UUID, if present
01040 
01041         // Parse data members
01042         DWORD dataoffset = 0;
01043         CHKRESULT(ParseDataMembers(fs, fileformat, floatbits, tpls, (*obj)->tpl, 1, &dataoffset, *obj));
01044         return R_OK;
01045 }*/
01046 
01047 
01048 Result TestwiseLoadMesh(std::ifstream* fs, byte fileformat, byte floatbits, String tplname, const std::list<Template*>* tpls, MeshData *mdata)
01049 {
01050         std::list<Template*>::const_iterator template_itr;
01051         DWORD plaindata_arraysize;
01052         PlainDataPtr plaindata;
01053         WORD token;
01054         UINT i;
01055         Result rlt;
01056 
01057         // Mesh data object
01058         if(tplname != String("Mesh"))
01059                 return ERR("");
01060 
01061         // '{'
01062         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01063         if(token != TOKEN_OBRACE)
01064                 return ERR("");
01065 
01066         // 1 integer
01067         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01068         if(token != TOKEN_INTEGER_LIST && token != TOKEN_PLAININTEGER)
01069                 return ERR("");
01070         if(plaindata_arraysize != 1)
01071                 return ERR("");
01072 
01073         // nVertices
01074         mdata->nVertices = *plaindata.i;
01075         if(fileformat == D3DXF_FILEFORMAT_TEXT)
01076         {
01077                 // ';'
01078                 CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01079                 if(token != TOKEN_SEMICOLON)
01080                         return ERR("");
01081 
01082                 // nVertices vertices
01083                 CHKALLOC(mdata->vertices = new D3DXVECTOR3[mdata->nVertices]);
01084                 for(i = 0; i < mdata->nVertices; i++)
01085                 {
01086                         // 1st float (x coordinate)
01087                         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01088                         if(token != TOKEN_PLAINDECIMAL)
01089                                 return ERR("");
01090                         mdata->vertices[i].x = *plaindata.f;
01091 
01092                         // ';'
01093                         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01094                         if(token != TOKEN_SEMICOLON)
01095                                 return ERR("");
01096 
01097                         // 2nd float (y coordinate)
01098                         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01099                         if(token != TOKEN_PLAINDECIMAL)
01100                                 return ERR("");
01101                         mdata->vertices[i].y = *plaindata.f;
01102 
01103                         // ';'
01104                         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01105                         if(token != TOKEN_SEMICOLON)
01106                                 return ERR("");
01107 
01108                         // 3rd float (z coordinate)
01109                         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01110                         if(token != TOKEN_PLAINDECIMAL)
01111                                 return ERR("");
01112                         mdata->vertices[i].z = *plaindata.f;
01113 
01114                         // ';'
01115                         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01116                         if(token != TOKEN_SEMICOLON)
01117                                 return ERR("");
01118 
01119                         if(i == mdata->nVertices - 1)
01120                         {
01121                                 // ';'
01122                                 CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01123                                 if(token != TOKEN_SEMICOLON)
01124                                         return ERR("");
01125                         }
01126                         else
01127                         {
01128                                 // ','
01129                                 CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01130                                 if(token != TOKEN_COMMA)
01131                                         return ERR("");
01132                         }
01133                 }
01134         }
01135         else
01136         {
01137                 // nVertices * 3 floats
01138                 CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01139                 if(token != TOKEN_FLOAT_LIST)
01140                         return ERR("");
01141                 if(plaindata_arraysize != mdata->nVertices * 3)
01142                         return ERR("");
01143                 mdata->vertices = (D3DXVECTOR3*)plaindata.f;
01144         }
01145 
01146         // 1 integer (text format), 1 + nFaces integers (binary format)
01147         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01148         if(token != TOKEN_INTEGER_LIST && token != TOKEN_PLAININTEGER)
01149                 return ERR("");
01150 
01151         // nFaces
01152         mdata->nFaces = *plaindata.i;
01153         if(fileformat == D3DXF_FILEFORMAT_TEXT)
01154         {
01155                 // ';'
01156                 CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01157                 if(token != TOKEN_SEMICOLON)
01158                         return ERR("");
01159 
01160                 // nFaces faces
01161                 CHKALLOC(mdata->faces = new WORD[3 * mdata->nFaces]);
01162                 for(i = 0; i < mdata->nFaces; i++)
01163                 {
01164                         // nFaceVertexIndices (only 3 supported)
01165                         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01166                         if(token != TOKEN_PLAININTEGER || *plaindata.i != 3)
01167                                 return ERR("");
01168 
01169                         // ';'
01170                         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01171                         if(token != TOKEN_SEMICOLON)
01172                                 return ERR("");
01173 
01174                         // 1st index
01175                         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01176                         if(token != TOKEN_PLAININTEGER)
01177                                 return ERR("");
01178                         mdata->faces[i * 3 + 0] = (WORD)*plaindata.i;
01179 
01180                         // ','
01181                         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01182                         if(token != TOKEN_COMMA)
01183                                 return ERR("");
01184 
01185                         // 2nd index
01186                         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01187                         if(token != TOKEN_PLAININTEGER)
01188                                 return ERR("");
01189                         mdata->faces[i * 3 + 1] = (WORD)*plaindata.i;
01190 
01191                         // ','
01192                         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01193                         if(token != TOKEN_COMMA)
01194                                 return ERR("");
01195 
01196                         // 3rd index
01197                         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01198                         if(token != TOKEN_PLAININTEGER)
01199                                 return ERR("");
01200                         mdata->faces[i * 3 + 2] = (WORD)*plaindata.i;
01201 
01202                         // ';'
01203                         CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01204                         if(token != TOKEN_SEMICOLON)
01205                                 return ERR("");
01206 
01207                         if(i == mdata->nFaces - 1)
01208                         {
01209                                 // ';'
01210                                 CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01211                                 if(token != TOKEN_SEMICOLON)
01212                                         return ERR("");
01213                         }
01214                         else
01215                         {
01216                                 // ','
01217                                 CHKRESULT(ParseToken(fs, fileformat, floatbits, &token, &plaindata, &plaindata_arraysize));
01218                                 if(token != TOKEN_COMMA)
01219                                         return ERR("");
01220                         }
01221                 }
01222         }
01223         else
01224         {
01225                 // nFaces faces: First element = nFaces; Every 4th element = nFaceVertexIndices (1, 5, 9, ...)
01226                 CHKALLOC(mdata->faces = new WORD[3 * mdata->nFaces]);
01227                 for(i = 0; i < mdata->nFaces; i++)
01228                 {
01229                         // nFaceVertexIndices (only 3 supported)
01230                         if(plaindata.i[i * 4 + 1] != 3)
01231                                 return ERR("");
01232 
01233                         // 1st, 2nd and 3rd index
01234                         mdata->faces[i * 3 + 0] = (WORD)plaindata.i[i * 4 + 2];
01235                         mdata->faces[i * 3 + 1] = (WORD)plaindata.i[i * 4 + 3];
01236                         mdata->faces[i * 3 + 2] = (WORD)plaindata.i[i * 4 + 4];
01237                 }
01238         }
01239 
01240         return R_OK;
01241 }
Generated on Mon Jun 14 11:03:53 2010 for Iron Sight Engine by  1.6.3
